data.title: Pentair Pool Pumps Guide
data.meta_description: Learn more about Pentair’s outstanding pool pumps and how they can benefit your pool from Liquidus Pool Services in Dallas, Texas.
data.text:
A pool pump is a vital part of your pool. It allows your pool water to be cleaned, treated, and heated. A properly functioning pool pump enables you to enjoy worry-free pool usage and may even save you money on your energy bill. At Liquidus Pool Services, we proudly supply and repair Pentair pool pumps. Pentair is a trusted manufacturer of high-quality pool pumps and other pool products. In this blog post, Liquidus Pool Services will look at some of Pentair’s outstanding pool pumps and how they can benefit your pool.

As Pentair says, “Your pool is only as good as your pump.”

Work with a pool professional to determine the best pool pump for your situation.

Please note: Given the danger involved, it is best to have your pool pump installed and maintained by a reputable professional.

Pentair

Pentair offers an array of pool and spa equipment and products for various other industries. Pentair emphasizes the importance of reducing its carbon footprint, having a responsible supply chain, creating sustainable product designs, and ensuring diversity and inclusion in its business.

Pentair Pool Pumps

Pentair offers several pool pump lines with different models for various applications. Pentair pool pumps offer reliability, energy efficiency, and high performance.

Below are some of Pentair’s outstanding pool pumps and their benefits.

IntelliFlo VSF Variable Speed and Flow Pool Pump

The IntelliFlo VSF Variable Speed and Flow Pool Pump is the world’s best-selling variable-speed pump, and when you look at its features, it is easy to understand why.

It is the first variable speed and flow pump that can adjust based on flow conditions, allowing it to maintain its pre-programmed flow rate. This enables it to function optimally for the entire filtration cycle. This feature is helpful, as pools have different designs, and conditions may change.

IntelliFlo VSF Variable Speed and Flow Pool Pump Features:

Quiet operation – The IntelliFlo VSF only makes 45 decibels of noise. That’s quieter than a single-speed pump at 67 decibels and even moderate rainfall at 50 decibels.

Easy-to-use menu

The enclosed fan-cooled design allows for longer life and better performance.

Top-mounted field wiring compartment allows for easier connection and access.

Features eight programmable speed and flow settings along with a built-in timer

Better energy efficiency compared to one and two-speed pumps

Compatibility with Pentair Automation

SuperFlo VST Pool Pump

The SuperFlo VST Pool Pump is an excellent pump for pool owners who are practical and interested in saving money. The SuperFlo VST can adapt to 115V to 230V and 50hz or 60hz power without any special wiring or switching.

SuperFlo VST Pool Pump Features:

A reliable and sturdy enclosed fan motor

An enhanced mechanical seal for reliable and long-lasting performance

Three programmable speeds along with override capacity and a real-time 24-hour clock

An easy-to-use digital keypad

The ideal new or standard pool pump replacement for pools that require up to a 1.5 horsepower pump

Quiet operation

Easy-to-access wiring compartment

Informative display shows watt usage and other operational information

WhisperFlo VST Variable Speed Pool Pump

The WhisperFlo VST Variable Speed Pool Pump is energy efficient and reliable. It features more power than the SuperFlo VST; going from a SuperFlo VST to a WhisperFlo VST can reduce your energy bill. It also adapts to 115v to 230v and 50hz or 60hz power without special wiring or switching.

WhisperFlo VST Variable Speed Pool Pump Features:

Variable speed technology for increased energy savings

A durable, enclosed fan-cooled motor that withstands chemicals and high temperatures

User-friendly programming with an onboard digital display and a 24-hour real-time clock

Three programmable speeds and an override

Connection compatibility with automation systems

The perfect new or standard pool pump replacement for pools that need up to a 2-horsepower pump

Pool Pump Services in the Dallas, Texas, Area

At Liquidus Pool Services, we proudly offer Pentair Pool Pumps. Whether it’s for a new pool installation or you want to upgrade your existing pool in the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex, we can help. In addition to installing pool pumps, we also offer maintenance and repair services to keep them working efficiently. We also offer several other pool services to keep your pool in excellent condition.
